participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about art, enjoys exploring different forms of artistic expression.
participant_1.background: My parents are very supportive of my art, even though they don't understand it. I tend to drop things when my stomach is empty. I am a cyclist. I had a gig at local theater last night. I love hot wings.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Active and family-oriented, always looking for ways to balance health and enjoyment in life.
participant_2.background: I'm looking for ways to control my blood sugar while still being able to enjoy my active lifestyle. I tore my ACL while racing go carts and couldn't race for the rest of the season. I put my children to bed. I have two tattoos. I can knit.

content.text: Hey, how is your day going?
I'm doing well! I just put my kids to bed, so now it's time for some me time.
Oh nice! What do you like to do for me time?
I love to knit or watch movies. I recently tore my ACL, so I can't be as active as I used to be, but I'm trying to find other ways to stay fit.
I see, I'm sorry to hear about your knee. I hope it heals well.
Thanks! It's a slow process, but I'm making progress.
That's good to hear! What type of knitting do you like to do?
I mostly like to knit sweaters and scarves. I'm also trying to learn how to knit socks.
Socks are hard! I've tried to knit them before, but I always end up giving up.
They are a little tricky, but I'm getting better at them.
That's good! What's your favorite movie to watch?
I love to watch romantic comedies. I just watched the new one with Sandra Bullock and Ryan Reynolds, and it was so funny!
I love that movie! I've seen it twice already.
It's so good! I love how funny it is.
Yeah, it's one of my favorite movies.
